name: Homeworld Takedown
description:
This game I've been working on for a little over a year. I had to design the engine and core of the game and I did all of the art mostly along with my friend. If you wanna help you can contact me on here or my email jjack7543@gmail.com. This is one of my biggest projects yet and I would love help to polish it. Homeworld Takedown is a top down wave based game. This game is actively being developed.

Click the settings button to see controls and to change them.
